14
You opened the drawers one by one.
You found a sock in the first drawer.
You found a candy in the second drawer.
You found a spider in the third drawer.
It ran away.
The fourth drawer is unlocked.
You found a piece of paper with a number written on it:
15666
## 3
Go back to west side of room.

drawer-open
&& 76
drawer-open
&& 116
drawer-open
&& 200
drawer-open
